articles.author: Aimee  Picchi
articles.title: Michael and Susan Dell to fund "Trump accounts" by giving $250 apiece to 25 million U.S. kids - CBS News
articles.description: Michael and Susan Dell said they will spend $6.25 billion to fund Invest America accounts for U.S. children.
articles.content: Michael and Susan Dell on Tuesday said they will donate $250 in so-called "Trump accounts" to 25 million American children, a $6.25 billion investment that the Dells said is designed to jumpstart the… [+3748 chars]
